type.description: You can change the type of the divider by setting the type prop to solid, dotted or dashed. Defaults to solid.
type.description_zh: 您可以通过将类型属性设置为实心、虚线或虚线来更改分隔线的类型。默认为 solid。

:avatar.description: Use the avatar prop as an object and configure it with any of its props.
:avatar.description_zh: 将头像道具用作对象，并使用其任何道具对其进行配置。

orientation.description: You can change the orientation of the divider by setting the orientation prop to horizontal or vertical. Defaults to horizontal.
orientation.description_zh: 您可以通过将方向道具设置为水平或垂直来更改分隔线的方向。默认为水平。
